caption.title: Binding assay of EV-A71 BrCr in presence of cyclosporine A (4μM), a known inhibitor of cyclophilin A.
caption.p: The bound virus was calculated by RT-qPCR and the graph shows the % of binding relative to the untreated group. Error bars represent the mean ± SD of two independent experiments with four replicates, each.
Click here for additional data file.
